page.title: 01INDUSTRY IN KEIGHLEY
page.content: Industry in the Keighley area has historically been based on the availability of water for both power and for use in various processes in the{textile industry.}Today the{ {textile industry}has declined as the major employer in the area with many mill closures being forced by a lack of demand for domestically produced wool and cotton products. In {1985}approximately {60%}of Keighley's working population are employed in{tertiary}industries such as Airedale Hospital,British Telecom, Local Administation and Retailing. {Secondary industry}employs about{38%} of the workforce in firms like Peter Black's and Magnet and Southern's.{ {Primary industries}such as Farming and Quarrying employ the remainder.Many Keighley people commute daily to work in Bradford and Leeds.
